div.p: GEntle Reader, for such faultes which haue escaped the Authours naughty pen, the Compositors wauering hande, the Correctors daseling eyè, and the Printers presse, we desire thee courtously to amend: for surely the Authour writes scarse good English, and a ragged hand withal, and the Compositor vnderstandes no Italian. Wherfore, standing at thy courtesie, we are perswaded thou wilt lightly pardon vs both. Farewel.
